name: sexyrate
author: Sajith

sections.description:
You can put a user rating system for your blog. The visitor of your blog or website can rate your blog. You can see how they response with your blog. Fully Ajax implementation. Fast loading. Nice design.
Features:

  • Self Improvement : You can improve your website functionalities.
  • Cute Look: Transparent plugin will give your blog a nice look
  • Girls Icons:Very impressive girls icons are used for giving more attraction to the rating.

For Example and Details Visit : http://www.sajithmr.com/sexy-rating-wordpress-plugin/

My Technical Blog is : http://www.sajithmr.com/

Arbitrary section

If you have any queires / complaints regarding this plugin, please feel free to mail me at admin@sajithmr.com. Thank you

A brief Markdown Example

See my blog for technical updates http://www.sajithmr.com .

Use sexyrating and improve your website quality. Happy Blogging
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the files
  2. Upload sexyrate directory (containing sexyrate.php file with image directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  4. Go to Design and edit , and paste the code <?php wp_show_my_rate() ?> anywhere as you wish (header.php or any file)
sections.faq:
Should i edit any files?

Yes, you need to edit your theme. Add this code: <?php wp_show_my_rate() ?>

Images are not displaying?

Make sure the path to main plugin file is /wp-content/plugins/sexyrate/sexyrate.php
